bibl.title: Letter from John R. Paul to Philip Showalter Hench, April 26, 1950

div1.p: Paul provides the names and addresses of Filiberto Ramirez Corria and Carlos Ramirez Corria.

div1.head: Letter from John R. Paul to Philip Showalter Hench, April 26, 1950
div1.opener:
YALE UNIVERSITY SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
NEW HAVEN II · CONNECTICUT
26 April 333 Cedar Street
Section of Preventive Medicine
Dear Phil-
div1.p:
I am sending for your files
to be held in anticipation of
your next trip to Cuba, these
names of 2 important Cuban
doctors who are our particular
friends.

DR FILIBERTO RAMIREZ CORRIA
(known in Cuba as Dr. Ramirez)
(now)
WHO IS DIRECTOR INSTITUTO FINLAY
LA HABANA

DR CARLOS RAMIREZ CORRIA
CUBAN MINISTER OF HEALTH
HABANA

It was nice seeing you here
last week. We all enjoyed you
later
